answerText: The Tin Drum[10] The Danzig Trilogy, including Cat and Mouse and The Tin Drum, was written by this German Author.
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 6 | 4 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This novel tells of the marriage of the protagonist's father to Maria, who gives birth to Kurt, who is possibly the protagonist's son. [10] Name this work about a boy who finds the severed finger of Sister Dorothea and allows himself to be convicted of her murder well after his father, Alfred, dies while swallowing his Nazi badge.
